title: Create labor booking platform with neighbor discovery

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for laborers that stores profile information including name, skills/services offered, location, contact details, and availability status
acceptanceCriteria: Laborer profiles can be created with all required fields
Laborer data persists across canister upgrades
Profile information can be retrieved and updated

requirements.text: Implement backend booking system that allows laborers to create booking requests for other laborers, including service type, date/time, duration, and status tracking (pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled)
acceptanceCriteria: Laborers can create booking requests for other laborers
Bookings include all required details (service, date, time, duration)
Booking status can be updated through state transitions
Bookings are associated with both requester and provider laborers

requirements.text: Create neighbor discovery functionality that filters and displays laborers based on proximity or neighborhood location
acceptanceCriteria: Laborers can be filtered by location/neighborhood
Query returns laborers sorted or filtered by proximity
Location-based search is performant

requirements.text: Build user authentication system using Internet Identity for laborers to securely log in and manage their profiles
acceptanceCriteria: Laborers can authenticate using Internet Identity
Authenticated users can access only their own profile and bookings
Session state persists across page refreshes

requirements.text: Create a laborer profile management page where users can view and edit their profile information, services offered, and availability
acceptanceCriteria: Profile page displays all laborer information
Users can edit and save profile changes
Form validation ensures required fields are filled
Changes are reflected immediately after saving

requirements.text: Build a neighbor laborer discovery interface that displays nearby laborers with their skills, availability, and allows filtering by service type and location
acceptanceCriteria: Displays list of laborers with profile information
Users can filter by service type and location
Each laborer card shows key information (name, skills, availability)
Interface is responsive and easy to navigate

requirements.text: Create a booking request interface where laborers can select another laborer, choose service details, specify date/time, and submit booking requests
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select a laborer from the discovery page to book
Booking form includes service type, date, time, and duration fields
Form validation prevents invalid bookings
Success confirmation is shown after booking creation

requirements.text: Build a bookings dashboard showing both outgoing booking requests (requests made to others) and incoming booking requests (requests received from others) with status indicators and action buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays two sections: outgoing and incoming bookings
Each booking shows service, date, time, status, and laborer information
Laborers can confirm, cancel, or complete bookings with appropriate buttons
Status changes update in real-time
Past and current bookings are distinguishable

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, professional colors and clear typography that conveys trust and accessibility for labor workers, avoiding blue and purple color schemes
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied across all pages
Typography is clear and readable
Design feels welcoming and professional
Visual hierarchy guides users through key actions

constraints: Use single-actor Motoko architecture for all backend logic
Authentication must use Internet Identity only
Frontend must use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn components
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Real-time chat or messaging between laborers
GPS-based location tracking or maps integration

required: Hero background image showing diverse laborers at work in warm lighting (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Simple handshake icon representing booking connection in earth tones (handshake-icon.dim_128x128.png)
